page.title: 06 A day in the life of Donna
page.content: In the morning I am woken up by my alarm clock at 7-30 a.m..I get up and get dressed for school.For my breakfast I have cereal and toast. I leave the house at 8-30 and call for my friend Sharon who lives close by.We walk to school,Longton High,taking a short cut through Weston Woods.School begins with registration at 9-00,at 9-30 lessons begin and continue until 10-45 when we have a short break until 11-00.Dinner begins at 12-20 when a mad rush takes place for the dining hall.School begins again at 1-25 and we work all afternoon until 4-00. As soon as I get home I have my tea and then go and attend to my horse. After riding my horse I then go home and start on my homework.I go to bed at 10-00p.m. Donna Redman
